In a surprise move Eric Schmidt delivered the news as the company announced fourth-quarter profits that were far better than analysts had expected. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! he tweeted as the results were released. Google reported a profit of$ 2.54 bn( Â£ 1.59 bn), up from$ 1.97 bn a year earlier, far better than expected. he does not have the same level of vanity as Simon Cowell . Speaking to Parade, the CNN host claimed that Simon Cowell has undergone excessive facial treatments that he would never consider. He began: I'm not as vain as him, physically. He has all these treatments and Botox and all. I don't do that kind of thing. The former America's Got Talent judge added:`` I think we've both got big egos. Which are always, of course, driven half by supreme self-confidence and half by supreme insecurity.''
